heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Provision in Respect of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Provision in Respect of 
Children with Special Educational Needs) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (provision respect child special educational needs) act 2022 (commencement) order

title: Respect of Children with Special Educational Needs) Act 2022 (No. 22 of
Respect of Children with Special Educational Needs) Act 2022 (No. 22 of
heading: 2. The 25th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 25th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Education (Provision in Respect of Children with Special Educational Needs) 
Act 2022 (No. 22 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [382] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 July, 2022. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [382]
